name: RPS population simulator
description: Inspired by an online gif, a small webtoy that spawns Rocks Papers and Scissors, you can simulate a couple of conditions and watch the game play itself. Built with Phaser 3

name: 1 Gorilla vs 100 humans
description: Sandbox to 'simulate' a fight between 1 gorilla and 100 humans, you can change the stats of the gorilla and the humans, and watch them fight.

name: Sorting Algorithms Visualizer
description: Inspired by a YouTube video, a small web toy that visualizes and assigns a sound to each number in an array and then it sorts it step by step with the chosen algorithm. Built with React

name: Three js old portfolio
description: The old version of my resume website, during the pandemic I got into VR and did some 3D modeling, part of this process culminated in making my old portfolio page. Built with Three.js, and the models were made with Blender

name: Werecat
description: Game made during a global game jam in 2022 with my wife. You play as a rat with a revolver. Built with Phaser 3

name: Morse Madness
description: Game made during a global game jam as part of a team, asynchronous cooperative game where you have to decode morse code to progress. Built with Phaser 3
